rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C170450

definition: Terminology relevant to the origin source for datasets in the Define-XML document.
name: Origin Source

terms.definition: A person responsible for the conduct of the clinical trial at a trial site. If a trial is conducted by a team of individuals at the trial site, the investigator is the responsible leader of the team and may be called the principle investigator.
An entity that is responsible for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study.
An individual who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
A person or agency that promotes or exchanges goods or services for money. (NCI)
